keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein served as President of Financial Informatics, Inc. and later Southern Trust Company, Inc.
The corporation was incorporated on November 18, 2011, in the U.S. Virgin Islands.
Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn held significant executive roles within the corporation.
The corporation changed its name from Financial Informatics, Inc. to Southern Trust Company, Inc. on October 31, 2012.
The document includes resolutions regarding corporate governance and share distribution.
